abstract: United States men's national soccer team looks forward to boisterous crowd support in Seattle, where they face Ecuador in Copa America quarterfinal match.
lead_paragraph: The American team, which faces Ecuador on Thursday night, is looking to return to the final four of the tournament for the first time in 21 years.

headline.main: U.S. Expects Boost From Seattle Crowd at Copa América
headline.print_headline: U.S. Expects Boost From Seattle Crowd

snippet: The American team, which faces Ecuador on Thursday night, is looking to return to the final four of the tournament for the first time in 21 years.
